## Task 4 Part 3

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
```

```{r}
names(diamonds)
dim(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)
```

```{r}
ggpairs(diamonds)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat , y = price))+
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat))+
  geom_histogram()
```
